channel.title: CVE Feed for Savoir-faire Linux -- Jami
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Savoir-faire Linux -- Jami

item.title: CVE-2023-3434|2024-10-22T14:32:14.447Z -- savoir-faire%20linux -- jami
item.description:
Improper Input Validation in the hyperlink interpretation in Savoir-faire Linux's Jami (version 20222284) on Windows.
This allows an attacker to send a custom HTML anchor tag to pass a string value to the Windows QRC Handler through the Jami messenger.

item.title: CVE-2023-3433|2024-10-22T14:51:50.722Z -- savoir-faire%20linux -- jami
item.description: The "nickname" field within Savoir-faire Linux's Jami application is susceptible to a failed state when a user inserts special characters into the field. When present, these special characters, make it so the application cannot create the signature for the user and results in a local denial of service to the application.
